events.name: Kubernetes Solutions
events.description:
Temmuz ayındaki buluşmamızda Kubernetes hakkında konuşacağız, herkesi bekleriz.

Konuşmacımız,
İsmail BASKIN (https://twitter.com/baskindev)
Google Developer Expert

Başlıklar,
- Managing Deployments Using Kubernetes Engine
- Build a Slack Bot with Node.js on Kubernetes
- Deploy a Web App on GKE with HTTPS Redirect using Lets Encrypt

Detaylar,
- Uygulamalarımızı Kubernetes üzerinde Canary, Blue-Green gibi farklı deployment stratejileri ile deploy edeceğiz,

- Kubernetes üzerinde çalışan bir Slack Botu yayına alacağız,

- Kubernetes Engine yayına aldığımız uygulamamızı otomatik olarak SSL sertifikası ekleyeceğiz.

🐣🐣Etkinliğe gelmeden önce yapılması gerekenler:
- Laptop getirmeyi, https://qwiklabs.com adresi üzerinde hesap oluşturmayı unutma. 😇😇

Etkinlikte görüşmek üzere. 🖖🖖
events.how_to_find_us: Metro Sanayi metro durağı yürüme mesafesinde

events.name: Google Cloud 101
events.description:
🚀 Want to get started on the Google Cloud, but don't know where to begin? Join us!
Get official Google training, a $55+ value, free of charge. Together we'll work through several Google Cloud labs. You will get hands-on experience with the Cloud Console, Kubernetes, Security, IoT on Cloud, and Machine Learning.
Then after our live session, you will have free access to more labs you can finish at home. Complete all labs in the quest and earn a Google-hosted badge for your online profile, and additional 30 days access to the training platform to compete any labs you want

Bring a laptop and charger (PC, Mac or Chromebook)! The labs will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers. For the best experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or Chrome installed. Don’t forget your charger.

Agenda:
6:30pm: 🍕 Networking
7:00pm: Google Cloud Platform Essentials labs
8:00pm: ☕ Networking
8:30pm: Google Cloud Platform Essentials labs
9:30pm: Event ends

⚠ Meetup gelenler arasında ücretsiz DevFest'19 Izmir etkinliğine bilet kazanma şansı.

events.name: Serverless Application with Flutter and Cloud Functions
events.description:
Flutter, açık kaynak kodlu ve Google tarafından geliştirilen bir mobil uygulama SDK’sıdır. Nesne tabanlı Dart dilini kullanarak hızlı bir şekilde Android ve iOS platformlarına özgü arayüzler tasarlamanızı sağlayan Flutter tamamen açık kaynaklıdır.

Flutter hakkında daha çok bilgi ve uygulama geliştireceğimiz etkinliğimize hemen kayıt olun!

Önemli Not: Etkinliğimize gelirken bilgisayarınızı ve aşağıda bulunan linkten gerekli kurulumları yaptığınızdan emin olun!

Etkinliğimize gelmeden önce de Flutter’ı kurmayı unutmayın! Flutter’ı kurmak için kullanabileceğiniz kaynaklar:
https://flutter.io/
https://link.medium.com/zbp1xmI5yS

Agenda:
13:00 -> 📱 Making a mobile app with Flutter
14:00 -> ☕ Networking
14:15 -> ☁ Making the app Serverless
14:45 -> ☕ Networking
15:00 -> ☁ Making the app Serverless
15:45 -> ☕ Networking
16:00 -> 📱 Making a mobile app with Flutter

Speaker:
Mirkan Çalışkan - https://twitter.com/mirkancal
Mehmet Karaköse - https://www.linkedin.com/in/mehmet-karakose/

Etkinlik sponsorumuz Google Cloud teşekkürler.
events.how_to_find_us: Eski itfaiye binasının yanındaki Lozan Sandawich'in olduğu bina. Birinci kat.

events.name: Firebase Study Jam
events.description:
Join a community of like-minded developers and explore the latest Firebase for Web technologies as a team.

Want to get started building web apps? Learn how to do that with Firebase!
Join us for our Firebase Study Jam! Together we'll work through Firebase for web codelabs prepared by Google instructors.

Bring a laptop and charger (PC, Mac or Chromebook)! The labs will run on all of the latest versions of popular browsers.
For the best experience check out Get Started with Firebase for Web.

Agenda:
6:00pm: ☕ Networking
6:30pm: Firebase Intro & Firebase CodeLab
9:00pm: Event ends

Speaker:
Mehmet Karakose - https://www.linkedin.com/in/mehmet-karakose/

Social Media
Twitter: @gdgcloudizmir
Instagram: @gdgcloudizmir
LinkedIn: GDG Cloud Izmir

Thanks to our event sponsor, Google Cloud.
#FirebaseStudyJam

events.name: [WEBINAR] Cloud Run ile Google altyapısı ve Kubernetes'te serverless uygulamalar
events.description:
Selamlar,

Google Cloud ekibinden Ahmet Alp Balkan, bu webinar’da canlı demo'lar yaparak Kubernetes kullanımını kolaylaştıran yeni bir ürün olan Cloud Run'dan bahsedecek.

Webinar'in online katilim linki: https://cloudonair.withgoogle.com/events/cloud-run-webinar-emea-2020?talk=kubernetes

events.name: 🚀 Triple Study Jam - Cloud Study Jam, Firebase Study Jam & Flutter Study Jam
events.description:
🎯 Want to get started on the Google Cloud, Firebase & Flutter , but don't know where to begin? Join us!

Get official Google training, a $55+ value, free of charge. Together we'll work through several Google Cloud labs. You will get hands-on experience with the Cloud Console, Kubernetes, Security, IoT on Cloud, and Machine Learning.
Then after our live session, you will have free access to more labs you can finish at home. Complete all labs in the quest and earn a Google-hosted badge for your online profile, and additional 30 days access to the training platform to compete any labs you want

💻 Bring a laptop and charger! The labs will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers. For the best experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or Chrome installed. Don’t forget your charger.
Please install Firebase CLI, Flutter. Related links:
https://firebase.google.com/docs/cli
https://flutter.io/
https://link.medium.com/zbp1xmI5yS

Agenda:
10:00pm: ☕ Networking
10:30pm: Cloud Study Jam - GCP Essentials
12:00pm: GCP Projects, Service Account And Billing
13:00pm: 🍕 Lunch
14:00pm: Firebase Study Jam
15:00pm: ☕ Networking
15:30pm: Flutter Study Jam
17:00pm: Event ends

Speaker:
Emre Akca - https://www.linkedin.com/in/emrekc
Mehmet Karakose - https://www.linkedin.com/in/mehmet-karakose/

Social Media
Twitter: @gdgcloudizmir
Instagram: @gdgcloudizmir
LinkedIn: GDG Cloud Izmir

Thanks to our event sponsor, Google Cloud.

#FlutterStudyJam

upcoming.name: Simplifying your CI/CD build pipeline to GKE with CircleCI
upcoming.description: İlk online etkinliğimizin konuşmacı Yuce Sungur bizlere "Simplifying your CI/CD build pipeline to GKE with CircleCI" başlıklı konuşmasını sunmak için 8 Nisan 19:00'da youtube üzerinde yayında olacak.
